definition: a fine crack in a glaze or other surface, to develop a fine network of cracks
details:
noun
- a fine crack in a glaze or other surface
- an interest followed with exaggerated zeal
= synonyms: furor
- state of violent mental agitation
= synonyms: fury, hysteria, delirium, frenzy
verb
- to develop a fine network of cracks
- to cause to go crazy
= synonyms: madden
